item.title: 20220823171728-quicknotes
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again “Because when you give too many fucks—when you give a fuck about everyone and everything—you will feel that you’re perpetually entitled to be comfortable and happy at all times, that everything is supposed to be just exactly the fucking way you want it to be.

item.title: All your perfects
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again $~$ “I promise to love you more when you’re hurting than when you’re happy.
